column2: This table gives Attic inflectional endings. For declension in dialects other than Attic, see Appendix:Ancient Greek dialectal declension.

column1: Czech: oligarchie  Finnish: oligarkia  French: oligarchie  Turkish: oligarşi  German: Oligarchie  Greek: ολιγαρχία ‎(oligarchía)  Georgian: ოლიგარქია ‎(oligarkia)
column3: Hebrew: אוליגרכיה  Irish: olagarcacht  Italian: oligarchia  Latin: oligarchia  Russian: олига́рхия ‎(oligárxija)  Armenian: օլիգարխիա ‎(ōligarxia)  Swedish: oligarki
